attributes.action: Petition for the Uk to Help save the Eu
attributes.additional_details: Overnight 09/12/11 , Britain's relationship with Europe changed. Britain vetoed a European Treaty, which had the potential to save Europe from economic meltdown. This petition calls for the Tory government to listen to the people of Britain, and discover that it is in the British interest. The consequences of not helping our neighbors and old allies, could be devastating .
